item.description:
Come check out The People’s Party, a groove-filled rock/funk/jazz/hippie-hop band based out of Boston, this Thursday, October 11th at PA’s Lounge in Somerville at 10pm.

They sound like an orgy between The Grateful Dead, The Roots, Paul Simon, Talking Heads, The Meters, and Dave Matthews Band.

You can see more about them at www.facebook.com/ThePeoplesPartyMusic or www.reverbnation.com/thepeoplesparty

A link to the event of Facebook is http://www.facebook.com/events/325053040926587/
item.name: The People's Party @ PA's Lounge
